# eui-field

## Properties

| Property           | Attribute            | Description                                                 | Type                             | Default     |
| ------------------ | -------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`         | `disabled`           | passes on disabled state to the component                   | `boolean`                        | `undefined` |
| `error`            | `error`              | error message that is to be displayed                       | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `errorDisplayType` | `error-display-type` | message to be displayed in case of error                    | `"always" \| "onError"`          | `'always'`  |
| `label`            | `label`              | label that is to be displayed infront of over the component | `string`                         | `null`      |
| `labelStyle`       | `label-style`        | sets the label style of the component                       | `"default" \| "strong"`          | `'default'` |
| `size`             | `size`               | sets size on child component                                | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'small'`   |


## Methods

### `setError(error: string) => Promise<void>`

Sets the error for the field
